title: Property Virtual Assistant
snippet:
Hi,

I'm looking for a superstar virtual assistant to work within my team to generate leads for our property business in the UK.

Type of Position:

Part Time Support to grow over time 
10 - 15 hours per week 
2 - 3 hours per day 
Monday to Friday

Main tasks involve generating leads from websites, data entry into googlesheets, 

The Essential qualities we are looking for:

Experience in the UK/US property/Real Estate market - preferred
Be Confident
Fluent English speaking essential
English Spelling and Grammar required
Self-Motivated
Reliable
Team player
Spreadsheet management
Use of Skype

Equipment Requirements:

Smart Phone needed Android or iPhone for use of Voxer communication App
Excellent Internet connection

Proposed Compensation:

$5 per hour 15 hours per week potential to increase over time to full time hours

If you believe you have these qualities please get in touch

Looking forward to speaking to you!

Kind Regards,
Matt

Other Skills: Appointment Setting, Data Entry, Internet research, Lead generation, Telemarketing, Virtual Assistant, Podio experience, reporting
